query:
SELECT id
        FROM comms_channels
        WHERE channel_type = 'direct_message'
        AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM comms_channel_participants cp
            WHERE cp.channel_id = comms_channels.id
            AND cp.user_id = $1
        )
        AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM comms_channel_participants cp
            WHERE cp.channel_id = comms_channels.id
            AND cp.user_id = $2
        )
